mapper.select: SELECT resve_num, r_num, resve_date, resve_memCnt, resve_chk, resve_sttus, resve_name, resve_phoneNum FROM( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rn, resve_num, resve.r_num, resve_date, resve_memCnt, resve_chk, CASE WHEN resve_sttus = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS status_order, resve_sttus, resve_name, resve_phoneNum FROM eatstamp.resve resve JOIN eatstamp.rest rest ON resve.r_num = rest.r_num JOIN eatstamp.member member ON rest.r_name = member.mem_nick JOIN (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE member.mem_nick = #{mem_nick} ORDER BY status_order ASC, resve_date DESC ) t1 WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM eatstamp.resve resve JOIN eatstamp.rest rest ON resve.r_num = rest.r_num JOIN eatstamp.member member ON rest.r_name = member.mem_nick WHERE member.mem_nick = #{mem_nick}
SELECT r_num, r_name, r_resveCode, r_resveTime, r_resveDay, r_resveMemCnt, r_resveTableCnt FROM rest WHERE r_name = #{r_name}
mapper.update: UPDATE rest SET r_resveCode = #{r_resveCode}, r_resveTime = #{r_resveTime}, r_resveDay = #{r_resveDay}, r_resveMemCnt = #{r_resveMemCnt}, r_resveTableCnt = #{r_resveTableCnt} WHERE r_name = #{r_name}
